product_name: Eagle Creek Convertible Laptop Handbag - Women's
long_description: As a shoulder bag, the women's travel-friendly convertible Eagle Creek Convertible Laptop Handbag holds a tablet; convert the bag to its tote mode and it holds a 15 in. laptop. With flap folded, the shoulder bag measures 14.5 x 10 x 2.75 in.; unfolded, it expands in height by 6 in. for more carrying capacity. Carry the expanded-size tote by carry handles or its adjustable, removable 50 in. cross-body shoulder strap. Secure-Zip(TM) toggle closure on main compartment deters theft. Passport pocket is hidden inside a zippered pocket. Padded pocket lined with e-fleece holds a tablet or 15 in. laptop; additional e-fleece-lined electronics pocket holds a phone or music player. Internal organization includes slip pockets, zippered pocket, pen slot and key lanyard. External back zippered pocket holds a tablet. Eagle Creek Convertible Laptop Handbag for women features reflective trim for low-light visibility as well as custom metal hardware and a satin lining.
short_description: As a shoulder bag, the women's travel-friendly convertible Eagle Creek Convertible Laptop Handbag holds a tablet; convert the bag to its tote mode and it holds a 15 in. laptop.
